reviews.title: Friendly, good location and great view
reviews.text: We stayed here over christmas on our way to Nashville. The Inn is in an excellent location and has fantastic views. We had a room with a king bed and the room was huge.

reviews.title: Great place to stay- peaceful and charming!
reviews.text: The Inn is quaint and is not a Marriott..... but i loved it and i think the only addition they could make is a snack vending machine.

reviews.title: We Love Sky Harbor Bavarian Inn
reviews.text: Worth the view alone and rates were reasonable.

reviews.title: honeymoon from h*ll
reviews.text: My Husband and I went there for our honeymoon. We had a great time and I would highly suggest it to others. The owners are charming and very helpful. The room was furnished with wonderful antique furniture. The view we could not get enough of!We opted for the small kitchen and we didn't become "burned out" by eating out every meal. We are planning on going there again very soon, with our children.

reviews.title: Our special get-away
reviews.text: My husband and I have been going to Sky Harbor Bavarian Inn for several years. It has always been very clean and the owners/managers are friendly and extremely nice. We go there for our anniversaries and sometimes for a mini-vacation, just to escape from stress. It is very peaceful and relaxing. We love sitting on our private porch, rocking and taking in the beautiful view. They have a variety of rooms, some with king or queen size beds and some with full size. My husband and I prefer the full size bed because we always sleep close together anyway. We have recommended the Sky Harbor Bavarian Inn to all our friends and they always thank us. If you are going to Chattanooga, TN., it is a great place to stay.

reviews.title: charming!
reviews.text: We loved this inn. It was perfect for small children. The owners are friendly. The view is great. It is quaint and charming. The pool is nice and the view from the pool is awesome. We will continue to stay here each time we are in the area and have recommended this inn to others!

reviews.title: A nice place to stay
reviews.text: We chose The Sky Harbor Bavarian Inn as a stop over on our way to Savannah this summer. It was quaint, clean, peaceful, and afforded a spectacular view from the deck. Totally enjoyable experience. We plan on staying again in the future.

reviews.title: We ADORE this place!!
reviews.text: The Sky Harbor Bavarian Inn is the best place to stay in Chattanooga. The view alone is worth the stay. It is the perfect little country inn on the side of a mountain. We spent the majority of our time in Chattanooga sitting on the two rocking chairs overlooking the city day and night! It is definately the most unique, cozy, and relaxing little inn. The hotel was booked the weekend we were there, but we felt like the only people there! We felt very safe, and taken care of, as the owners were very hospitable and friendly. The room was clean, but the furniture and comforter was a little rustic. The pool was nice and clean and has a beautiful view also. I highly recommend a whirlpool room. Our time spent here was perfect and very romantic! If you can't relax and enjoy yourself at the Sky Harbor Inn, then you must be very, very uptight! The visit was very worth it! We plan on going back in the fall when the leaves change for the gorgeous view!

reviews.title: A Great Get-Away
reviews.text: What a great place to spend a few nights. The view, along with the many splendid trees, and just plain old nature, was enough to make one forget about day to day hassles. The location is close to just about anything you want to do, but the location makes it seem you are far, far away from civilization. I would love to give it an EXCELLANT rating but I hesitate since the bedding (sheets and pillowcases) was past the age of retirement.
